While donning his Kurama chakra cloak, Naruto infuses an enlarged Tailed Beast Ball with his wind-natured chakra, before throwing it at a target, creating a great explosion upon contact.

[[pt-br:Grande Bola: Rasenshuriken da Bola de Besta com Cauda]]
